tags.name: User Authentication
tags.description:
Allows user to authenticate themselves by either

- Sign IN
- Sign UP
    

Also provides the endpoints that can be used to perform common tasks such as:

- Changing Passwords
- Verifying Currently logged in user

tags.name: Authenticated Routes
tags.description: The routes will only be accessible to users who have successfully logged into the system using appropriate APIs
